name: Gunner Guide
description:
You are a Magic Bullet. Guide the Gunner through 3 mazes and hit the targets to disable traps in time. Will you go for a High Score by hitting Consecutive Targets? Or will you try to beat your best time? Can you do both? You're in control, not the Gunner.

This is a free game, but please consider purchasing at $1.00 or more if you are interested in supporting me and my work.
